ygData.messageBody:
> I've tried this too for the reasons you cite. The problem I
> have with it is that there's no command to automatically face
> the mob you are fighting, and in multi-mob situations it's
> easy to get turned or have the mob move enough so that "you
> cannot see your target" anymore. You'd think that if I'm
> fighting something, I'd automatically want to keep facing
> it...

I used to have that problem as well, I guess I just got so used to the view
that I can pretty much turn to face my next opponent while still in it. If
I'm having a problem a quick two taps of F9, a little adjustment and then F9
three more times is all I need to do..
